name: .CDP File Extension
summary: Learn about .CDP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Trainz Simulator railroad simulation games; contains game add-on content, such as train routes, locomotive designs, and scenery; can be imported using the Content Dispatcher and Content Manager Plus tools within Trainz Simulator products; installed in the World\Dispatcher\Downloads folder of Trainz installations.

content: CDP files are developed by third party content providers, such as Auran, and are not part of the original game content. Several tools exist for managing CDP packages.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
